001package org.nasdanika.drawio.emf;
002
003import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
007import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
008import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
009import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
010import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
011import org.nasdanika.drawio.ModelElement;
012import org.nasdanika.drawio.Page;
013import org.nasdanika.graph.Element;
014import org.nasdanika.graph.processor.ProcessorConfig;
015import org.nasdanika.graph.processor.ProcessorInfo;
016import org.nasdanika.graph.processor.emf.ResourceSetPropertySourceEObjectFactory;
017import org.nasdanika.graph.processor.emf.SemanticProcessor;
018
019/**
020 * @author Pavel
021 *
022 */
023public abstract class DrawioEObjectFactory<T extends EObject, P extends SemanticProcessor<T>> extends ResourceSetPropertySourceEObjectFactory<T,P> {
024        
025        @Override
026        protected void setRegistry(ProcessorConfig<P> config, P processor, Map<Element, ProcessorInfo<P>> registry, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
027                super.setRegistry(config, processor, registry, progressMonitor);
028                Element element = config.getElement();
029                if (element instanceof ModelElement) {
030                        Page linkedPage = ((ModelElement) element).getLinkedPage();
031                        if (linkedPage != null && !"false".equals(getPropertyValue(config.getElement(), getLinkPagePropertyName()))) {
032                                linkPage(config, processor, registry, registry.get(linkedPage), progressMonitor);
033                        }
034                }                               
035        }
036
037        protected String getLinkPagePropertyName() {
038                return "link-page";
039        }       
040        
041        /**
042         * Processes elements from the linked page. This implementation collects all page semantic elements without container and processes then as children of this element.
043         * @param config
044         * @param semanticElement
045         * @param registry
046         * @param likedPageInfo
047         */
048        protected void linkPage(ProcessorConfig<P> config, P processor, Map<Element, ProcessorInfo<P>> registry, ProcessorInfo<P> linkedPageInfo, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
049                ProcessorInfo<P> thisInfo = ProcessorInfo.of(config, processor, null);
050                linkedPageInfo.getConfig().getElement().accept(pe -> {
051                        ProcessorInfo<P> re = registry.get(pe);
052                        if (re.getProcessor() != null) {
053                                setParent(re.getConfig(), re.getProcessor(), thisInfo, progressMonitor, f -> {
054                                        f.printStackTrace(); // Should never happen
055                                });
056                        }
057                });             
058        }
059        
060        @Override
061        protected Context createElementContext(ProcessorConfig<P> config) {
062                Context superContext = super.createElementContext(config);
063                
064                Context context = new Context() {
065
066                        @Override
067                        public Object get(String key) {
068                                if (Util.isBlank(key)) {
069                                        return null;
070                                }
071                                
072                                // page name
073                                if (config.getElement() instanceof Page) {
074                                        Page page = (Page) config.getElement();
075                                        if ("name".equals(key)) {
076                                                return page.getName();
077                                        }
078                                        if ("id".equals(key)) {
079                                                return page.getId();
080                                        }
081                                } else if (config.getElement() instanceof ModelElement) {
082                                        ModelElement modelElement = (ModelElement) config.getElement();
083
084                                        if ("id".equals(key)) {
085                                                return modelElement.getId();
086                                        }
087
088                                        String label = modelElement.getLabel();
089                                        if ("label".equals(key)) {
090                                                return label;
091                                        }
092
093                                        if ("label-text".equals(key)) { // Plain text label                                                     
094                                                return (Util.isBlank(label) ? label : Jsoup.parse(label).text());
095                                        }
096
097                                        if ("link".equals(key)) {
098                                                return modelElement.getLink();
099                                        }
100
101                                        if ("tooltip".equals(key)) {
102                                                return modelElement.getTooltip();
103                                        }
104                                }
105                                
106                                return null;
107                        }
108
109                        @Override
110                        public <ST> ST get(Class<ST> type) {
111                                return null;
112                        }
113                        
114                };
115                return context.compose(superContext);
116        }
117        
118        @Override
119        protected Object getElementQualifier(ProcessorConfig<P> config) {
120                Map<String,Object> qualifier = new LinkedHashMap<>();
121                Element element = config.getElement();
122                qualifier.put("type", element.getClass().getCanonicalName());
123                if (element instanceof Page) {
124                        qualifier.put("id", ((Page) element).getId());
125                } else if (element instanceof ModelElement) {
126                        qualifier.put("id", ((ModelElement) element).getId());                  
127                } else {
128                        qualifier.put("hash", element.hashCode());
129                }
130                return qualifier;
131        }
132        
133}
